mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sell(sellno, name, cnt, price, rdate, managerno, foodno, resno) VALUES (sell_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{cnt}, #{price}, sysdate, #{managerno}, #{foodno}, #{resno})
mapper.select: SELECT sellno, name, cnt, price, rdate, managerno, foodno, resno FROM sell WHERE managerno = #{managerno} ORDER BY sellno ASC
SELECT s.sellno, s.name, s.cnt, s.price, s.rdate, r.resname FROM sell s INNER JOIN restaurant r ON s.resno = r.resno WHERE s.managerno = #{managerno} ORDER BY sellno ASC
